question: Barabati fort was captured by Maratha in the year?
explanation: On 16<sup>th</sup> April 1742, Bhaskar Pandit sent by Raghuji Bhosle Captured Barabati fort. Odisha was under control of Alivardi Khan that time.Â  Alivardi Khan Managed to save Murshidabad by paying a huge amount of money to Bhaskar Pandit.
